B

BINARY_OP_PARSED - Static variable in class com.instil.lgi.BinaryOperatorParser
Default type for every block created from this binary operator parser
BinaryOperatorParser - Class in com.instil.lgi
This class comprises the parsing of a binary operator Block into a tree of Blocks where each one is a function (method) call and the precedence in the operators is represented by a tree structure.
BinaryOperatorParser() - Constructor for class com.instil.lgi.BinaryOperatorParser
Creates a new instance of BinaryOperatorParser with the defailt numerical type BINARY_OP_PARSED.
BinaryOperatorParser(int) - Constructor for class com.instil.lgi.BinaryOperatorParser
Creates a new instance of BinaryOperatorParser specifying the numerical type for all Blocks created while transforming the binary operator to precedence driven Blocks (function calls typically).
Block - Class in com.instil.lgi
Basic node of a parsed tree.
Block() - Constructor for class com.instil.lgi.Block
Creates a new instance of Block with empty operator and with no children.
Block(String, int, int) - Constructor for class com.instil.lgi.Block
Creates a new instance of Block with the specified region in the provided, String as the parsed area of the String.
Block(String, int, int, int, Block[]) - Constructor for class com.instil.lgi.Block
Creates a new instance of Block with the specified String and region as parsed contents, the Block will be set to the specified type, and will add the Blocks given in the array as its children.

This class comprises the parsing of Strings into Block trees.

Creates a new instance of PackratParser with the provided grammar.
parse(String) - Method in class com.instil.lgi.PackratParser
This method attempts to parse the specified text for a Block of the first (usually top-level in the hierarchy) type in the grammar.
parse(String, boolean) - Method in class com.instil.lgi.PackratParser
This method attempts to produce a parsed tree from the specified text, and allows the user to specify if the tree and possible error causes should be optimized after generated.

This method attempts to parse the specified text for a Block of the specified type.

ParsingExpressionGrammar - Class in com.instil.lgi
This class is the hand-parsed tree of the Parsing Expression Grammar specification (PEG.txt) found in the examples directory of this distribution.

Creates a new instance of ParsingExpressionGrammar.

Creates a new instance of ParsingGrammar given the specified Block tree and the optimize flag.
PEGUtility - Class in com.instil.lgi
This is a GrammarUtility implementation used by the ParsingExpressionGrammar to optimize the parsed trees and parse errors generated by it.
